Description

Be among the first to order your Early Adopter Kit or Pre-Order Kit, and we will notify you as soon as it's on its way. Early Adopter Kits ship during Summer 2020, and Pre-Order Kits are will ship during our Full Launch in Fall 2020!

The All-New Halo Collar Does It All:

  • Halo Smart Fences keep your dog safely contained in a virtual, installation-free fence that you create using your Halo collar's built-in GPS OR with the tap of your finger in the Halo App. Save up to 20 unique fences at a time so that your dog can safely stay in a wide variety of locations—without the cost of installing new fences in each location.
  • Halo's training designed by Cesar Millan will teach you how to safely establish rules, boundaries and limitations, while increasing your dog's trust, respect, and love. Set custom preferences that are just right for your dog, and Halo will provide automated feedback to keep your dog safe. In addition, that you can use Halo as a training collar to provide manual feedback—including using their Halo Whistle to tell your dog to come back to you!
  • Halo's activity tracking shows what your dog is up to any time of day. Daily activity charts will show you how much time each day your dog has spent in safe areas, on walks, active vs. resting, and more.
  • Halo's advanced GPS/GNSS allows you to create the most accurate smart fences possible, so that you can keep your dog safe and protected anywhere you go. Once your fence is saved and synced, your dog's Halo is automated—so no need to worry about Wi-Fi or cellular interruptions affecting the boundaries you create.

Collar Description

The Halo collar comes in one size, and its flexible, comfortable, durable design makes it a great fit for dogs 15-20lbs and up. Designed by the best minds in IoT technology and dog psychology, the Halo collar features:

  • One Halo Collar size (flexible fit for dogs with neck sizes 11 inches+), pairs with separate collar strap (your choice of S, M, or L strap for best fit)
  • For use with dogs ages 5 months+
  • Flexible, comfort fit
  • Ultra-durable rubber material
  • Lightweight design
  • Water-resistant up to 6 ft of depth
  • Color-Coded LED matches the color you set for your dog's profile color in your app
  • World-class Bluetooth, GPS/GNSS, LTE, and data security

Plans

Your Halo Collar purchase will be accompanied by your choice of plan, starting at $.09/day (billed at $2.70/mo). Kit Includes:

Halo Collar (One Size), Collar Strap (Select Size above), Halo Beacon, Wall Charger, USB-C Charging Cable, 3 Pairs of Collar Attachments (Contact Tips (R), Contact Tips (S), Contact Blanks)

Size Guide

To measure your dog's collar size

  • Place a tape measure (or a string) around the neck, and hold both ends together
  • Tighten the tape measure until you can fit 2 fingers comfortably between the neck and tape measure
  • Check the length on your tape measure and match to the corresponding size in the chart
  • Your dog's collar strap can be adjusted according to their best fit once you receive their Halo Collar
